p: The fraction JK11 (134 mg) was further purified by CC in isocratic conditions, eluting with a mixture of hexane/EtOAc in the ratio of 95:5. A total of five fractions were collected according to TLC and subfraction 4 (15 mg) was subjected to preparative TLC. The plate was eluted with hexane/EtOAc in the ratio of 6:4, yielding 3 mg of pure Sipaucin A.
